original_title: Deadline for submission of bids for SriLankan extended
original_body_lines: The deadline for submission of bids for SriLankan Airlines has been extended by 45 days, says Minister of Ports, Shipping and Aviation Nimal Siripala de Silva.
The live auction to choose an investor for the divestment of SriLankan Airlines was scheduled to take place today (March 05).
